Description: We are hiring FM Engineers for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 5 years of overall experience with 3 years experience of managing comparable operations in the GCC region.
Bachelor’s degree/diploma in Mechanical Engineering or Electrical Engineering.
UPDA – Grade A preferred, QCDD is a plus.
A valid Qatar driver’s license is a must
Fluency in English and Arabic language is a must.
Arabic nationality
Male candidates are required.
Age: 35 years old and below
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
